column1: Local Foods////A lot of pressure gets put on a place and a dish when Food and Wine Magazine says you have the number one dish in Houston. I was expecting to bite into pure heaven with that statement but was sadly let down. I don't believe that was Local Foods fault
column2: it was just hyped up by the bold statement from Food & Wine. Don't get me wrong
column3: the food was very fresh and tasty
column4: I was just expecting a bit more of a wow factor from the crunchy chicken sandwich.
